faqs.question: How do I register for a tournament?
faqs.answer: To register, create an account on our website, select the tournament you want to join, pay the entry fee if applicable, and confirm your registration.

faqs.question: What games are supported?
faqs.answer: We currently support tournaments for BGMI, Free Fire, and Ludo.

faqs.question: How is the prize money distributed?
faqs.answer: Prize distribution varies per tournament and is detailed on each tournament’s page. Winners will receive their prizes directly to their registered wallets.

faqs.question: Can I join a tournament after it has started?
faqs.answer: No, participants must join before the tournament start time. Late entries are not accepted.

faqs.question: What happens if a tournament is cancelled?
faqs.answer: In case of cancellation, all entry fees will be refunded to the participants’ wallets within 3-5 business days.

faqs.question: How do you handle cheating or unfair play?
faqs.answer: We have strict rules and use leaderboard verification to prevent cheating. Any suspicious activity will lead to disqualification.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app for the tournaments?
faqs.answer: Currently, we operate through our responsive website, accessible on all devices. A mobile app is in development.

faqs.question: How can I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our support team via the contact form on our website or by emailing support@pao.com.
